author: wrowe
msg: Added a new API for NetWare to allow Apache the chance to unimport
module symbols before it shuts down.
This is necessary so that Apache on NetWare can shutdown cleanly
in an error condition such as a failure while reading the .CONF file.

author: gstein
msg: um. hello?! doesn't the work "private" mean anything? :-)
Apache should not be involved with building APR's apr_private.h.in. It
should only call APR's buildconf.sh script.

author: gregames
msg: finally figured out why that word looked funny - can't spell

author: gregames
msg: insure that canned error msgs are translated to ascii before leaving
an ebcdic server in worst case scenarios.

author: wrowe
msg: Clean up this mess ... stripped out all the bogus absolute paths
from win32 the .mak structure.  Our immunity has been that our master
makefile.win doesn't recurse the .mak projects, and we simply build
all .mak targets in the order we choose.  Use src/helpers/fixwin32mak.pl
when exporting these .mak files to keep up with it.
